channel.title: GPG error when onionizing Tor Project Updates
channel.description:
Hello, i'm trying to Onionize Tor Project by following documentation: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Security_Guide#Onionizing_Repositories But after giving "apt-get update" it shows me:
> W: GPG error: http://sdscoq7snqtznauu.onion jessie InRelease: The following signatures couldn't be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY 74A941BA219EC810

item.title: GPG error when onionizing Tor Project Updates
item.dc:creator: eujan1
item.description:
You are welcome and glad it worked. What is trivial for experts is not always so for new users. The whonix team has been very helpful with my questions and am happy to help where I can.

Read full topic
item.source: GPG error when onionizing Tor Project Updates

item.description:
Thank you again, it worked.

item.title: GPG error when onionizing Tor Project Updates
item.dc:creator: eujan1
item.description:
You need to import the Tor project public key.

Read full topic
